channel.title: Crezion -/ Ironman, XP Modes, Achievements, Pest Control, ClueScrolls \-
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2efv035.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://crezion.com/Crezion.jar"][B]Download[/B][/URL] ll [URL=http://"http://crezion.com"][B]Website[/B][/URL] ll [URL=http://"http://crezion.com/forum/"][B]Community[/B][/URL]
Crezion is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion's Development Team for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available. Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. [/MOD]
A few months ago, I made a decision to run a server at the same time earn a good community and to improve my skills. I started with a clean Matrix base, credits goes to Matrix, I'll just say that it is still a flawed server, which I'll improve. My goal with this server, is also to give my players a pleasurably server, and where you have to work to get the good armours and more!
[B]Starter[/B] [B]Regular Player[/B] – Regular RSPS Player. [B]Iron Man Mode[/B] – Iron Man, choosable XP.
[B]XP Modes[/B] Squire Mode: [B]85x[/B] Experience Rate Knight Mode: [B]50x[/B] Experience Rate Legend Mode: [B]5x[/B] Experience Rate
[B]Clan System[/B] Creating, joining, leaving, rank giver, color changing & motto’s, chatting & guests. [B]Toolbelt System[/B] Adding Items, using them to do skills. [B]Hunger Game[/B] It takes place in a small area where you have to try to kill each other. Including: Lobby, titles & rewards. [B]MoneyPouch[/B] Working adding & withdrawing. [B]Requirements & Achievements[/B] There are bunch of requirements to obtain Completionist, so you’ll have to work hard for it! Aslo, an Achievement system, there aren’t many yet, but it’ll come. [B]Summoning[/B] Pouch & Scroll Creation, including most familiars. [B]Lodestone Network[/B] Activation, animation & short cutscene. [B]Clue Scrolls[/B] Over 20 clues, including interface & epic rewards. [B]Duel Arena & Anywhere[/B] You're allowed to send send a challenge anywhere. Perfected system including: Friendly & stake duels. [B]Pest Control[/B] Landers, player requirements, lobby, joining, timer & rewards interface. [/MOD]
[IMG]https://gyazo.com/c5de55fd4f7f677dc712413c8f655e31.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/4f6b534666d80c3797abef465bf6b69e.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/211e0524c18e0198e2c8e83efa5f50c2.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/c35e2d69bd1fa866cd74275791879b2e.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/553da18120f8f3dfde4c619c162a079b.png[/img]
[SPOILER=More] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/0a955a508c090ae72292022067e3217d.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/852db81b29f763356b86051f58315970.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/b7eb3cbcaef2a7b1a5ff960aaf8274ab.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/3990f7a24a23d59aa256e532e135a96f.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/0ec4e566d30a78c5aab9b58a31cca862.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/c6bfb4a09e5683c3b2051e2287467e00.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/8e33f20be17be830a5ea96f95dffb58d.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/a3963d10a2184b7496a882623c485714.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/caf39c38c94f94f175be0de2d98ae6ae.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/199b24394eefd14370e4bde68d00293f.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/7a6b82b01191360e2830c12507656a33.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/80d679ab57f6e5a33bb90edec9957b09.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/91b9d3e32e887c7089452cae726f6e4d.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/0d6eaaa808e34ede3e5f304af0f0e195.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/56846fb6373ee1e9e77bcb0170563a71.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/ff3e03934dfe7b9d89abb8c66f7c3ccc.png[/img] [IMG]https://gyazo.com/8fda26b3c8ed3d91fe5b6aab9f4a68bf.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

item.title: Crezion -/ Ironman, XP Modes, Achievements, Pest Control, ClueScrolls \-
item.dc:creator: @entrinthy_rs entrinthy rs
item.description:
@entrinthy_rs wrote:

[CENTER]
Download ll Website ll Community

Crezion is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment made by Crezion’s Development Team for players & focusing on player satiscation with daily updates and a large amount of content available. Crezion aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for our players with features that the community wants rather than what the development team. [/MOD]

A few months ago, I made a decision to run a server at the same time earn a good community and to improve my skills. I started with a clean Matrix base, credits goes to Matrix, I’ll just say that it is still a flawed server, which I’ll improve. My goal with this server, is also to give my players a pleasurably server, and where you have to work to get the good armours and more!

Starter
Regular Player – Regular RSPS Player.
Iron Man Mode – Iron Man, choosable XP.

XP Modes
Squire Mode: 85x Experience Rate
Knight Mode: 50x Experience Rate
Legend Mode: 5x Experience Rate

Clan System
Creating, joining, leaving, rank giver, color changing & motto’s, chatting & guests.
Toolbelt System
Adding Items, using them to do skills.
Hunger Game
It takes place in a small area where you have to try to kill each other.
Including: Lobby, titles & rewards.
MoneyPouch
Working adding & withdrawing.
Requirements & Achievements
There are bunch of requirements to obtain Completionist, so you’ll have to work hard for it! Aslo, an Achievement system, there aren’t many yet, but it’ll come.
Summoning
Pouch & Scroll Creation, including most familiars.
Lodestone Network
Activation, animation & short cutscene.
Clue Scrolls
Over 20 clues, including interface & epic rewards.
Duel Arena & Anywhere
You’re allowed to send send a challenge anywhere.
Perfected system including: Friendly & stake duels.
Pest Control
Landers, player requirements, lobby, joining, timer & rewards interface. [/MOD]
